name: Heave Ho! A Pirates Life for Me!
name_original: Heave Ho! A Pirates Life for Me!
description:
Heave Ho! Ye scurvy dogs! Take your ship and attack ye enemies until they are under the deep blue. Yar and Yo HO!

Controls:

Use the mouse to move your ship from left to right. Click on the left mouse button to launch your cannon ball. Stop the cannon ball from falling down the bottom of the stream. 

Notes:

This was made in Unity as a assignment from Udemy. I really enjoyed putting my own spin on the Block Breaker formula. I hope you all enjoy and thank you for playing!
